name: Puerta
description:
This "game" was designed for the theme of the GMTK Game jam 2019 "Only One". 

It is a game about doors. The ways it adjusts to the theme are the following ones: 

  • The game was made in only one day instead of two.
  • The objective is to end the game with only one point.
  • Each door gives or takes only one point at the time.
  • There's only one door displayed at the time.
  • The game has only one color in any given time (It is monochromatic).
  • The background song has only one melody line (It is a monody).
  • There's only one sound effect in the game.
  • There's only one asset for the doors. 
  • The only one mechanic it has is to open the doors.
  • Some other secret only one's.

It is controlled with the mouse.  Each door can be opened by either side. 

For each door  there's one side that adds points and other side that takes points.

I hope you don't get too much frustrated with it. 

Note: I reuploaded it because a friend told me he couldn't play because of a missing .dll so hopefully it's fixed now.
